0.0.1.name: wordpress/wordpress-csv-importer
0.0.1.description:
Wordpress CSV Importer and data management plugin new for 2012.

Versus Other Imports

Wordpress CSV Importer offers a stand-alone solution for data importing and management. We are only just at the beginning of what we plan to offer in July 2012. If you are a developer or wish to hire a developer to work with this plugin on your blog, you will be happy to know that it is easy to customize.

Please seek support by creating a ticket here on the forum

Support

The plugin is supported by a dedicated team of developers who have worked on Wordpress for many years. It will also get its own website soon, offering documentation and tutorial videos.
